column5: My quaint apartment provides a fully stocked kitchen with plenty of room for up to 6 guests. Less than 3 minutes from two major highways. With Six Flags 15 minutes away and Sea World only 20 minutes, you won't have to travel too far for site seeing. Beautiful downtown is only 15 minutes away as well as the airport only 10 minutes away. Beautiful neighborhood with walking trail and a convenient pharmacy and grocery store just down the street. If you're looking to shop, Northdwoods is the place for quick shopping.
